article_node.title: Gold Reserve Provides Update on U.S. Government’s Statement of Interest Supporting Venezuelan Opposition Government in Litigation Regarding Validity of 2020 PDVSA Bonds
article_node.summary: Gold Reserve Ltd. reported that on Aug. 29, 2025 the U.S. government filed a Statement of Interest in a New York court case over the validity of 2020 PDVSA bonds. The statement affirms U.S. recognition of Venezuela’s 2015 National Assembly as the legitimate government and urges the court to give its views respectful consideration. The filing does not address the legal merits of the bonds but signals U.S. support for the opposition’s position. Gold Reserve’s bid to acquire PDVH shares remains subject to court approval and regulatory clearance.
